style.file-uploader: width: 100%, min-height: 200px, border: 1px dashed var(--dark-grey), display: flex, flex-direction: column, justify-content: center, align-items: center, row-gap: 8px, padding: 40px 0
style.close-button: position: absolute, top: 4px, right: 4px, width: 40px, height: 40px, font-size: 14px, color: var(--dark-grey)
